description: Update a project phase cost item quantity estimate.

flags.description: Estimate JSON payload (use null to clear)
flags.name: --estimate
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON and a JSON object; use null to clear.

permissions: User must be authorized to update the related project phase cost item (delegated to ProjectPhaseCostItem policy).
side_effects: Updates attributes and/or relationships of a project phase cost item quantity estimate.
validation_notes: At least one field must be specified for update. --revenue-item-quantity-basis must be greater than 0 when provided and cannot be empty. --estimate cannot be empty when provided; it must be valid JSON and a JSON object or null. --project-estimate-set cannot be empty when provided.
